title: Scenario: Launching App opens At The Ballpark page
custom_preconds: Given that the app has been installed
custom_steps:
When the app is launched
And the splash screen has disappeared
custom_expected:
Then the At The Ballpark page will appear
And the ballparks for all 30 teams will be listed

title: Scenario: At The Ballpark list of teams
custom_preconds: Given the app has been launched
custom_steps: When the user sees the ballpark list populate
custom_expected: Then all 30 teams will be listed

title: Scenario: User taps the Device's Back button
custom_preconds:
Given that the app has been launched
and the ballpark list of teams has loaded
custom_steps: When the user taps the device's back button
custom_expected: Then the user will be taken out of the app

title: Scenario: User does not have Location Services turned on
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And the splash screen has finished loading
And the user does not have location services turned on
custom_steps:
When the At The Ballpark page loads
And the the ballpark list has populated
custom_expected:
Then the app will display 'Unable to fetch location.Please enable a Location service.' above the "Ballparks" section
And will display all of the ballparks in alphabetical order under the "Ballparks" section

title: Scenario: User has Location Services turned on
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And the splash screen has finished loading
And the user has location services turned on
custom_steps:
When the At The Ballpark page loads
And the ballpark list has populated
custom_expected:
Then the app will display stadiums within a 25 mile radius of the users location in the "Nearby" section
And the app will display the remaining ballparks in alphabetical order under "Ballparks" section

title: Scenario: Nearby Ballparks - Stadium(s) within 25 miles
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been launched
And location services have been enabled
and the Ballpark list has loaded
custom_steps:
When there are stadiums within 25 miles from a user's location

(Example - "40.6644444, -74.2647222" (Roselle Park, NJ) is within 20-23 miles of Yankee Stadium and Citi Field)
custom_expected: Then these stadiums will display in the "Nearby" ballparks section

title: Scenario: Nearby Ballparks - Stadium(s) not within 25 miles
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been launched
And location services have been enabled
And the Ballpark list has loaded
custom_steps:
When there are NO stadiums within 25 miles of a user's location

(Example - "40.5430556, -74.3636111" (Metuchen, NJ) is about 30 miles from Yankee Stadium)
custom_expected: Then the app will display all ballparks in alphabetical order under the "Ballparks" section

custom_steps: When the user flicks up &/or down
custom_expected: Then the user will be able to scroll either up or down

REPEAT for all ballparks/teams

title: Scenario:  Configurable Stadium Image
custom_preconds:
Given the user is on any Ballpark Summary page
and the user can confirm that there is a stadium image at the top of the page
or the user can confirm that no stadium image exists
custom_steps: When navigating to that particular stadium after the stadium image has been updated
custom_expected:
Then we can confirm the changes made are reflected appropriately 


_To configure the stadium image in homebase:_
1) Navigate to Homebase (https://qahomebase.mlbcontrol.net/prototype/homebase.jsp)
2) Click 'Search Option' at the top
3) change "Item Type:" to "Ballpark"
4) change the "Start Date" to Nov. 1, 2011
5) Click on "Search"
6) Notice all ballparks appear as the search results
7) Then navigate to the ballpark (click edit to make changes to that ballpark)
8) Notice if the user changes anything in the "Thumbnail URL" field
9) then verify within the app that the changes made are reflected accordingly
